text: Filippos Petsalnikos (; 1 December 1950 â€“ 13 March 2020) was a Greek politician. He was a member of the Movement of Democratic Socialists. From 2009 to 2012, he was Speaker of the Hellenic Parliament. Before, he was a Member of the Hellenic Parliament from 1985 to 2012. He was born in Mavrochori, Greece. Petsalnikos died of leukemia on 13 March 2020 in Athens, aged 69.Former Speaker of the House Filippos Petsalnikos Dies at 70 ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Greece Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Speakers of the Hellenic Parliament
title: Filippos Petsalnikos
